welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pretoria-Noord, where the vibrant culture and warm hospitality will charm you from the moment you arrive. Known for its beautiful gardens and historical landmarks, we invite you to explore the city and embrace all it has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lanseria Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lanseria Airport, mainly used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport. Users must register and agree to the terms and conditions to access the network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pilanesberg Airport is a small but modern facility, offering a comfortable and convenient travel experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
